bilingual.source: The population of this district is quite diverse.
bilingual.target: 这个地区的人口非常多样化。

bilingual.source: Lake District National Park is in the north of England.
bilingual.target: 湖区国家公园位于英格兰北部。

bilingual.source: These poems have made the Lake District even more famous.
bilingual.target: 这些诗使湖区更加出名。

bilingual.source: Tomorrow evening, I'm going to a jazz bar in the Richmond District.
bilingual.target: 明天晚上，我要去里士满区的爵士酒吧。

bilingual.source: The highest mountain in England is in Lake District National Park.
bilingual.target: 英格兰最高的山在湖区国家公园。

bilingual.source: The Lake District is popular with artists who like to paint the beautiful countryside.
bilingual.target: 湖区很受喜欢描绘美丽乡村的艺术家欢迎。

bilingual.source: Do you know how to get to Xuhui District?
bilingual.target: 你知道如何去徐汇区吗？

bilingual.source: This district has many parks and schools.
bilingual.target: 这个行政区有很多公园和学校。

bilingual.source: The mercantile district is bustling with activity.
There are many shopping centers in hexi district.
bilingual.target: 河西区有许多购物中心。

list.abstract: district（英 [ˈdɪstrɪkt]，美 [ˈdɪstrɪkt]），英语单词，作名词为地区；区域；行政区。作动词为把…划分成区。短语搭配有school district（学区）。例句为“They have had a growing influence on the district.（他们对该学区的影响越来越大。）” district名词性近义词有area、place。

yingyinNormal.en: So this is it. Shanghai's famous Little Dublin district.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就是这儿，上海著名的都柏林区。

yingyinNormal.en: Even with every District and it's alliance, we're outgunned.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在即使联合所有区，我们的火药还是不够。

yingyinNormal.en: And we're on our way to District 13 right now. 13? 13. Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们正在去往第13区的路上，第13区？13区，没错。

yingyinNormal.en: 'Cause we need every district to stand up to this Capitol. The way you did.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为我们希望每个区都能起义反抗国会区，就像你一样。

yingyinNormal.en: And if a girl from District 12 of all places can defy The Capitol and walk away unharmed, what is to prevent them from doing the same?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果一个来自12区这种地方的小姑娘都可以在挑衅国会区后安然无恙，如何阻止其他区效仿？

yingyinNormal.en: It's manned by both military and civilian personnel from District 2.
yingyinNormal.zh: 由第二区的军事和非军事人员共同操作。

yingyinNormal.en: Tonight, the 12 district leaders will call for a free election.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今晚，十二个区的领袖们会举行一场自由选举。

yingyinNormal.en: The dam went down in District 5, took out most of the power to the Capitol, knocked out their signal defense.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第五区被摧毁的水电站切断了国会区大部分的电力，毁了他们的防御警报。

yingyinNormal.en: That I'm in District 8 where the Capitol just bombed a hospital filled with unarmed men, women and children.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我就在第8区，国会区刚刚轰炸了一间满是手无寸铁的男人，妇女和孩子的医院。

yingyinNormal.en: The road there leads through the sharp mountains and deep ravines of District 2.
yingyinNormal.zh: 通往第2区的是峥嵘山势和深沟险壑。

yingyinNormal.en: Which is why I won't condone a mass suicide. If we don't take District 2, we won't get in to the Capitol.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以我才不允许再发动一次自杀式袭击。如果我们不控制住第二区，我们就无法进入国会区。

yingyinNormal.en: A radioactive buried under dirt as if it had never existed like District 13.
yingyinNormal.zh: 放射性物质弥漫全城，只剩下死亡，如同消失的13区。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm commander Paylor of District 8. I'm a soldier like all of you, so...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是第八区的指挥官佩勒，与你们一样，我也是名战士，所以…

yingyinNormal.en: Cashmere and Gloss. Brother and sister. District 1. They won back-to-back Games. Capitol favorites. Lots of sponsors. They will be lethal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 凯斯麦尔和格劳斯兄妹，来自第1区，他们连续赢了两届比赛，国会区的最爱，拥有众多的赞助者，很有实力。

yingyinNormal.en: District 8. They reported heavy bombing last week. There are no military targets left.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第8区，报道说那里上星期刚被轰炸过，那里已经没有任何军事目标了。

yingyinNormal.en: Officers Grizzoli, Fangmeyer, Delgato. Your team take missing mammals from the Rainforest District.
yingyinNormal.zh: 灰熊利，牙迈尔，德尔加多警官，你们负责热带雨林区的失踪案。

yingyinNormal.en: Explore the malls and futuristic architecture of Hong Kong's main business district, Central.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在香港的主要商业区中环，您可以游走各大大小小的商场和富有未来感的建筑物。

yingyinNormal.en: From Hong Kong Island's central business district, take the half hour bus ride to the tranquil beaches of Shek O.
yingyinNormal.zh: 由香港岛的中心商业区，乘坐巴士到清静的石澳海滩只需半小时。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course. That's the same facile thinking that led you to divert our best peacekeepers into District 2.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，就是这种信口开河的态度，让你把我们的最佳护卫队转到第二区的。

yingyinNormal.en: This modern business district, filled with light and art, is testimony that Paris is designed for living, even when at work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个现代化的商业区充满了光明与艺术气息，证明巴黎人即使在工作中也不忘享受生活。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a region defined for an administrative purpose

examination_example.sentence: Except in the <highlight>District</highlight> of Columbia, non-lawyers may not own any share of a law firm.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了在哥伦比亚特区，非律师不得拥有律师事务所的任何股份。

examination_example.sentence: School <highlight>districts</highlight> across the country, most recently Los Angeles Unified, are revising their thinking on this educational ritual.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全国各地的学区，最近一次是洛杉矶联合学区，正在修改他们对这种教育仪式的想法。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>District</highlight> administrators say that homework will still be a part of schooling.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学区管理人员表示，家庭作业仍将是学校教育的一部分。

sense_info_list.en: an area of a country or city, especially one regarded as a distinct unit because of a particular characteristic

examination_example.sentence: Another nationwide concern is whether public funds from other agencies are going into construction in fire-prone <highlight>districts</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一个全国性的担忧是，其他机构的公共资金是否会投入到火灾多发区的建设中。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词, 指国家、市镇等的区域, 或建筑、处所等中作特定用途的场地。
从本义"带, 带状物"引申而指任何广阔的长条地带, 也可指种植某种作物的地区。
多指由政府等机构出于行政管理等目的而明确划分的地区。
指比section的划定更清楚, 范围更小。具体指城市中的住宅区, 也可指附近一带。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an area of a country or city; especially one regarded as a distinct unit because of a particular characteristic

examination_example.sentence: It is bringing the case to the local <highlight>district</highlight> court.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它正把这个案子提交给当地的地方法院。

examination_example.sentence: Some school <highlight>districts</highlight>, including San Francisco and Los Angeles, already offer ethnic studies at its high schools.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 包括旧金山和洛杉矶在内的一些学区已经在高中开设了种族研究课程。

examination_example.sentence: It is the oldest bridge across the canal, and was the dividing line between the <highlight>districts</highlight> of San Marco and San Polo.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是横跨运河的最古老的桥梁，是圣马可(San Marco)和圣波罗(San Polo)两地之间的分界线。

sense_info_list.en: a region defined for an administrative purpose

examination_example.sentence: Instead of bringing families together, Aderhold's letter revealed a divide in the <highlight>district</highlight>, which has 9,700 students, and one that broke down roughly along racial lines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阿德霍尔德的信非没能让家长们团结起来，反而揭露了这个拥有9700名学生的学区存在的分歧，而且这种分歧大致是按照种族界限来划分的。

examination_example.sentence: The issue of the stresses felt by students in elite school <highlight>districts</highlight> has gained attention in recent years as schools in places like Newton, Massachusetts, and Palo Alto have reported a number of suicides.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着马萨诸塞州牛顿市(Newton，Massachusetts)和帕罗奥多(Palo Alto)等地的学校报告了多起学生自杀事件，许多知名学区的学生备受压力一事近年来得到关注。

examination_example.sentence: The survey commissioned by the <highlight>district</highlight> found that 68 percent of high school honor and Advanced Placement students reported feeling stressed about school "always or most of the time."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学区的一项调查显示，有68%的高中三好学生和跳级生总是甚至无时无刻不在承受着来自学校的巨大压力。

examination_example.sentence: They have been huge supporters of the <highlight>district</highlight>'s advanced mathematics program, which once began in the fourth grade but will now start in the sixth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们也大力支持该学区的高等数学课程。以前，高等数学课程的开课年级为四年级，现在开始开课年级调整为六年级。

examination_example.sentence: West Windsor-Plainsboro has not had a teenage suicide in recent years, but Aderhold, who has worked in the <highlight>district</highlight> for seven years and been chief for the last three years, said he had seen troubling signs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 西温莎-普兰斯伯勒(West Windsor-Plainsboro)近年来虽然没有发生青少年自杀事件，但在该地区工作了七年并在过去三年担任区长的阿德霍尔德表示，他看到了令人不安的迹象。

examination_example.sentence: With his letter, Aderhold inserted West Windsor-Plainsboro Regional School <highlight>District</highlight> into a national discussion about the intense focus on achievement at elite schools, and whether it has gone too far.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过阿德霍尔德的这封信，西温莎-普莱斯伯勒地区学区加入到了一场关于精英学校过分重视学业成绩的全国性讨论。讨论还谈及这些学校是否为了取得好成绩而做得有些过头了。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，指国家、市镇等的区域，或建筑、处所等中作特定用途的场地。
从本义"带，带状物"引申而指任何广阔的长条地带，也可指种植某种作物的地区。
多指由政府等机构出于行政管理等目的而明确划分的地区。
指比section的划定更清楚，范围更小。具体指城市中的住宅区，也可指附近一带。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an area of a country or city, especially one regarded as a distinct unit because of a particular characteristic

examination_example.sentence: Join us for a ride through the historical Presidio <highlight>district</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 和我们一起骑车游览历史悠久的普雷西迪奥街区。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an area of a country or city, especially one regarded as a distinct unit because of a particular characteristic

examination_example.sentence: A high-tech zebra was put (put) into use for the first (one) time in Bishan <highlight>district</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一条高科技的斑马线闪烁着灯光。

examination_example.sentence: On July 17, 2016, the Shennongjia Forestry <highlight>District</highlight> was added to the United Nations World Heritage list as a natural site.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2016年7月17日，神农架林区被列入联合国世界自然遗产名录。

examination_example.sentence: Shanghai will make changes to 263 phone booths in Xuhui <highlight>District</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上海市将对徐汇区263个电话亭进行改造。
